flavor: "What do I tell them? Everything? Nothing?" —Singularity
name: Communication Issues
text: Give to the Singularity player. Each ally you play cost 1 additional resource. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Singularity and an ally you control → remove Communication Issues from the game.

flavor: "This blue one. It burns. It must be destroyed."
name: Antimatter
text: When Revealed: Antimatter engages Singularity. Forced Interrupt: When Antimatter would take damage from an attack, deal 1 damage to the attacking character. (Singularity's nemesis minion.)

flavor: Antimatter and Singularity are entangled at a quantum level. Until you find a way to sever their connection he cannot be truly destroyed.
name: Violent Rebirth
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard for Antimatter and reveal him. Forced Response: After Antimatter is defeated, deal him to Singularity as a facedown encounter card.

flavor: "Interesting. This oneis unlike the primary population of this planet." —Antimatter
name: Destructive Analysis
text: When Revealed: Discard a card you control. Place threat on the main scheme equal to the cost of that card. If that card costs 0, this card gains surge.

flavor: "You will get out of my way or die." —Antimatter
name: Antimatter Blast
text: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each character you control. [star] Boost: Deal 1 damage to each character you control.
